import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./homePage.scss';import video from'../../assets/video/video.mp4';import Slider from'../../components/slider';import{cuisineSlider,venueSlider}from'../../components/slider/mock';import{scrollToSection}from'../../utils/scrollToSection';import cocktail from'../../assets/images/cocktail.jpg';import{useNavigate}from'react-router';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var HomePage=function HomePage(_ref){var sideRef=_ref.sideRef;var navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(function(){scrollToSection(sideRef);},[sideRef]);var bookNow=function bookNow(){window.open('https://restaurant.opentable.com/v2/','_blank'// <- This is what makes it open in a new window.
);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"homePageWrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"homePage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{className:"video-background",autoPlay:true,muted:true,loop:true,playsInline:true,preload:'metadata',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("source",{src:video,type:"video/mp4"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"section1"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"section2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{title:'Cuisine',data:cuisineSlider,buttonValue:"menu",onClick:function onClick(){return navigate('/menu');}})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gradient-image",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:cocktail,alt:"img",className:"img-fluid img-gradient"})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"venue",className:"sectionVanue",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{title:'Gallery',data:venueSlider,buttonValue:"Book a Table",onClick:function onClick(){return bookNow();}})})})]});};export default HomePage;
